20101213010111.000|20101213010121.000|CCO|ENEMY LINES.
20101213010121.000|20101213010123.500|CCO|NORWEGIAN FILMMAKER PAUL 
20101213010123.500|20101213010126.000|CCO|RESTFALL CAME HERE IN THE '80s 
20101213010126.000|20101213010128.500|CCO|TO REPORT ON THE MUJAHADIN.
20101213010128.500|20101213010131.000|CCO|NOW HE RETURNS ON A DANGEROUS 
20101213010131.000|20101213010133.000|CCO|ASSIGNMENT, ONE THAT WILL TAKE 
20101213010133.000|20101213010135.000|CCO|HIM TO ONE OF THE COUNTRY'S 
20101213010135.000|20101213010137.000|CCO|DEADLIEST REGIONS.
20101213010137.000|20101213010139.000|CCO|IT'S AN ASSIGNMENT THAT COULD 
20101213010139.000|20101213010141.000|CCO|GET HIM KIDNAPPED AND KILLED.

20101213010143.857|20101213010145.286|CCO|TALIBAN FOR NINE YEARS.

20101213010149.571|20101213010151.000|CCO|ARE.

20101213010152.667|20101213010154.333|CCO|TO TELL THE STORY OF THESE 
20101213010154.333|20101213010156.000|CCO|PEOPLE WHO ARE FIGHTING THE U.S.

20101213010201.000|20101213010203.500|CCO|PEOPLE KNOW WHO WE'RE FIGHTING 
20101213010203.500|20101213010206.000|CCO|BECAUSE AT THE PRESENT, PEOPLE 
20101213010206.000|20101213010208.500|CCO|DOESN'T HAVE A CLUE REALLY.
20101213010208.500|20101213010211.000|CCO|>> Reporter: HIS PLAN IS TO 
20101213010211.000|20101213010213.000|CCO|SPEND 30 DAYS LIVING WITH THE 
20101213010213.000|20101213010215.000|CCO|TALIBAN.
20101213010215.000|20101213010217.000|CCO|ING THIS EXTRAORDINARY 
20101213010217.000|20101213010219.000|CCO|ACCESS IS DIFFICULT AND 
20101213010219.000|20101213010221.000|CCO|DANGEROUS.

20101213010223.000|20101213010225.000|CCO|CONTACT WITH THE TALIBAN?

20101213010227.000|20101213010229.000|CCO|CONTACT.

20101213010231.000|20101213010233.000|CCO|SEND A REQUEST TO THE COMMANDER 
20101213010233.000|20101213010235.000|CCO|ASKING HIM, THIS JOURNALIST, HE 
20101213010235.000|20101213010237.000|CCO|WANT TO COME AND STAY WITH YOU 
20101213010237.000|20101213010239.000|CCO|FOR A WHILE.
20101213010239.000|20101213010241.000|CCO|>> Reporter: HE WANTS TO VISIT A
20101213010241.000|20101213010242.250|CCO|TALIBAN STRONGHOLD IN KUNAR 
20101213010242.250|20101213010243.500|CCO|PROVINCE, A VOLATILE BORDER 
20101213010243.500|20101213010244.750|CCO|REGION WHERE FIGHTERS MOVE 
20101213010244.750|20101213010246.000|CCO|FREELY, WHERE AL QAEDA IS 
20101213010246.000|20101213010247.250|CCO|ACTIVE, WHERE THE TERRAIN IS 
20101213010247.250|20101213010248.500|CCO|TREACHEROUS. 
20101213010248.500|20101213010249.750|CCO|>> IT'S A VERY MOUNTAINOUS 
20101213010249.750|20101213010251.000|CCO|TERRAIN.
20101213010251.000|20101213010253.500|CCO|IT'S LIKE SWITZERLAND, 
20101213010253.500|20101213010256.000|CCO|BASICALLY, SO IT FAVORS 
20101213010256.000|20101213010258.500|CCO|INSURGENTS AND IT DOESN'T FAVOR 
20101213010258.500|20101213010301.000|CCO|MECHANIZED TROOPS. 
20101213010301.000|20101213010303.000|CCO|>> Reporter: PAUL RESTFALL 
20101213010303.000|20101213010305.000|CCO|REACHES OUT FOR ACCESS AND WAITS
20101213010305.000|20101213010307.000|CCO|IN KABUL.
20101213010307.000|20101213010309.000|CCO|FINALLY HE RECEIVES WORD. 
20101213010309.000|20101213010311.000|CCO|>> I'M WAITING IN KABUL ABOUT 
20101213010311.000|20101213010314.333|CCO|SIX WEEKS.
20101213010314.333|20101213010317.667|CCO|FINALLY I GET AN APPROVAL.

20101213010347.667|20101213010349.333|CCO|MEET THEM.

20101213010351.000|20101213010352.250|CCO|FOR THE FIRST TIME, I'M

20101213010353.500|20101213010354.750|CCO|SUCH A GOOD IDEA.

20101213010358.500|20101213010359.750|CCO|>> YES.
20101213010359.750|20101213010401.000|CCO|BUT THAT IS REALLY THE POINT OF

20101213010406.000|20101213010408.500|CCO|TWO-MAN CREW DRIVE TO A 
20101213010408.500|20101213010411.000|CCO|PREARRANGED SPOT.
20101213010411.000|20101213010413.000|CCO|THEY LEAVE THE CAR AND START 
20101213010413.000|20101213010415.000|CCO|HIKING TO REACH THE TALIBAN 
20101213010415.000|20101213010417.000|CCO|HIDEOUT.
20101213010417.000|20101213010419.000|CCO|>> SO WE START WALKING INTO THIS
20101213010419.000|20101213010421.000|CCO|VERY NARROW PASS.

20101213010905.000|20101213010907.000|CCO|AROUND THE WORLD. 
20101213010907.000|20101213010909.000|CCO|>> HERE I AM STAYING WITH MAOIST
20101213010909.000|20101213010911.000|CCO|SHINING PATH GUERRILLAS.
20101213010911.000|20101213010913.500|CCO|THERE IS ME IN KOSOVO.
20101213010913.500|20101213010916.000|CCO|YEAH, THAT'S WHEN I HAD HAIR ON 
20101213010916.000|20101213010918.500|CCO|MY HEAD.
20101213010918.500|20101213010921.000|CCO|>> Reporter: ON OCTOBER 3rd, 
20101213010921.000|20101213010922.667|CCO|2009, REFSDAL BEGINS ONE OF THE 
20101213010922.667|20101213010924.333|CCO|MOST DANGEROUS ASSIGNMENTS OF 
20101213010924.333|20101213010926.000|CCO|HIS CAREER, GOING BEHIND ENEMY 
20101213010926.000|20101213010927.667|CCO|LINES TO REPORT ON A GROUP OF 
20101213010927.667|20101213010929.333|CCO|TALIBAN FIGHTERS.
20101213010929.333|20101213010931.000|CCO|THERE WERE MANY DIFFERENT 
20101213010931.000|20101213010933.000|CCO|TALIBAN GROUPS FIGHTING FOR MANY

20101213014546.000|20101213014551.000|CCO|[ SPEAKING FOREIGN LANGUAGE ]
